testcase.name: Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given a teacher is on the CTSMS login page..................................passed When the teacher logs in with username "general@teacher.com" and password "123456".passed Then the teacher should be succesfully logged in and page title is "Chroma Tech Academy".passed

testcase.name: Invalid Credentials login attempt
testcase.system-out: Given a teacher is on the CTSMS login page..................................passed When a user attempts to login with invalid credentials such as username "test@fakeemail.com" and password "fakepassword".passed Then user should see message "Invalid Username or Password".................passed

testcase.name: Invalid login with multiple credentials
testcase.system-out: Given a teacher is on the CTSMS login page..................................passed When a user attempts to login with invalid credentials with username "test@email.com" and password "123456".passed Then user should see message "Invalid Username or Password".................passed

testcase.name: Invalid login with multiple credentials 2
testcase.system-out: Given a teacher is on the CTSMS login page..................................passed When a user attempts to login with invalid credentials with username "test1@email.com" and password "123456".passed Then user should see message "Invalid Username or Password".................passed

testcase.name: Invalid login with multiple credentials 3
testcase.system-out: Given a teacher is on the CTSMS login page..................................passed When a user attempts to login with invalid credentials with username "test2@email.com" and password "123456".passed Then user should see message "Invalid Username or Password".................passed

testcase.name: Invalid login with multiple credentials 4
testcase.system-out: Given a teacher is on the CTSMS login page..................................passed When a user attempts to login with invalid credentials with username "testingFakeusername" and password "scadsadsdc".passed Then user should see message "Invalid Username or Password".................passed
